duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and maintain professional relationships within all levels of the organization.
Audit, update, and retrieve documents from EDMSCreation of virtual links to information for easy accessibility.
Follow established Information Management practices, procedures, and guides, including attributing, numbering, and naming conventions.
Handle records and documentation, including preparation of internal and/or external distribution, archiving, indexing, cross-referencing, and destruction of information.
Use high-volume scanners to convert information into electronic format.
Identify document types, assign appropriate retention codes, and provide excellent internal and external customer service through written communication, TEAMS, or in person.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree preferred in IT related field, Engineering, Business, or Medical
